Re: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)

• Ghislaine Maxwell: 02879-509 
Please allow her access to the materials enclosed. 
Very truly yours, 
AUDREY 
STRAUSS 
United States Attorney 
Enclosure 
Assistant United States Attorneys
